member.name: T:DFT2.FFT
member.summary: Based on the COMP 5703: ADVANCED ALGORITHMS, FALL 2016 by Amente Bekele http://people.scs.carleton.ca/~maheshwa/courses/5703COMP/16Fall/FFT_Report.pdf

member.name: M:DFT2.FFT.Compute(System.Numerics.Complex[],System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: Output from freq 0 inclusive to frequency N/2 inclusive. Scales values by 2.

member.name: M:DFT2.FFT_Utility`1.Shift(`0[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Shifts array elements such that negative frequencies preceed the zero-th frequency

member.name: M:DFT2.IFFT.Compute(System.Numerics.Complex[],System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: FFT output was scaled by 1/N, N = sample size
Input ranges from freq 0 inclusive to frequency N/2 inclusive. Halves values by 2.
